mapper.select: select id, username, status, email, phone_number, sex, avatar, user_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from user where id=${id};
mapper.insert: insert into user(id, username, password, status, email, phone_number, sex, avatar, user_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{status}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sex}, #{avatar}, #{userType}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime});
